mapper.select: SELECT seqno, title, contents, regdate FROM test_metami
SELECT seqno, title, contents, regdate FROM test_metami where seqno = #{seqno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_metami (title, contents, regdate) VALUES(#{title}, #{contents}, now())
INSERT INTO test_metami (title, contents, regdate) VALUES(#{title}, #{contents}, now())
